ComicInfo.Title: Toontown Tumescence; Percentages; The Tease; Tough Love; ...Hot Date!; Esperanto Primer; The “Dangling”; Crippled Lust
ComicInfo.Summary:
Marvin goes for broke in propositioning as many women as possible in a bar.
Denny spends the night with a cocktail waitress whose boyfriend is out of town.
Denny gets punched by a woman he's making love to.
Denny's new lover is a dope user.
A lovemaking session spoken entirely in Esperanto.
Patrick relates a story involving a preacher, the preacher's wife, and a giant out-of-control penis.
Renee recounts what happened when an acquaintance tried to rape her.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-14 20:36:07. [Issue ID 434954]

ComicInfo.Letterer: Jis,Ellen Forney,Brett Siler,Holly Tuttle,Philip Dennison,Patrick Finney,Renée French
